outputs.output_descr: To contnue to phase out ODS and sustain compliance with Montreal Protocol's ODS PHASE-OUT schedule and other requirement of the prototcol by assisting National Ozone Office for effective implementation and monitoring of phase out of ODS in all sector of the Nigerian Economy; To strentgthen ODS import control mechnism and collaboration with relevant  hemical enforcement agencies to prevent illigal importation of ODS;To increase awareness on ODS Phase-out activities Nationwide.

project_descr: Extension of the Support to the National Ozone Office through the Institutional Strengthening Grant Phase VII.
project_title: Extension of Institutional Strengthening Project VII
